QuestData.Title: Hope for the People
QuestData.Description: About four years ago, in the dead of the night, a little girl walked right into our farmhouse and collapsed on the floor. Nobody had a clue as to her identity. The poor little thing had no recollection of who she was or where she came from - truly a lost soul.$B$BSoon after, we adopted the little girl and named her Hope - for that is what she represented.$B$BShe is now a young lady, caring for the destitute and homeless of Westfall. Take my Westfall stew to her at Sentinel Hill, south of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Westfall Stew to Hope Saldean at Sentinel Hill.
QuestData.CompletionText: Good day $g sir:miss;. How may I serve you?
QuestData.RewardText: I smell Westfall stew! Mother sent you!?
